His Britannic Majesty 1 s Political Agent The Agency, Bahrein. ROYALTY TICKETS - JULY. 1948 File: 075.1 Dear Sir, I enclose herewith two copies each of the following Royalty Tickets:- B-632-2 to B-650-1 (inclusive) These tickets represent the total amount of Crude Oil run from tanks Nos. 131, 152 and 153 to the Refinery, upon which the Royalty for July, 194-8 will be computed, I also enclose five extra copies of the Summary of Oil Deliveries, In addition to the above, please find enclosed one copy each of the following tickets, viz:- A-1417-2 to A-L4^4-l (inclusive) These tickets represent the amount of Arabian Crude Oil run from tanks Nos, 132, 133, 134- and 143. FOR R.M. BROWN T CHIEF LOCAL REPRESENTATIVE THE BAHREIN PETROLEUM COMPANY LIMITED Yours very truly. End tC .11.4S. The Bahrein Petroleum Company Limited Form B.P, 18. ' ' FILS: #075.1 Dear Sir, I enclose herewith two copies each of the following Royalty B-649-2 to B-668-1 (inclusive) Tickets These tickets represent the total amount of Crude Oil run from , tallies lies. 131, 152 and 153 to the Refinery, upon which the .loyalty for August, 194-3, will be computed. I also enclose five extra copies of the Summary of Oil Deliveries. In addition to the above, please find enclosed one copy each of the following tickets, viz.; A-14.64.-2 to A-l 511-1 (inclusive) These tickets■ represent the amount of Arabian Crude Oil run from tanks Nos. 132, 133, 134 and 143. Yours very truly. ittach; For R. M. POLITICAL AGENCY, BAHRAIN. Dated the 27th Sept, f 48. ENCLOSURE li / • / i \ Sumirary of Oil Deliveries for August 1948, SUBJECT /? V ROYALTY TICKETS / :/ h ■7 i / ! \ * e 6- NNBi/1f V^. (105/6/48). / ( J Dear Agency, Persian Gulf Residency, Bahrain . 12th October, 1948• i We note from your Printed Letter No. F - 17 - a8 /5 of the 27th September, and previous correspondence on the subject of the Bahrain Petroleum Company's oil royalty reports, that these reports are still being sent to the Commonwealth Relations Office, London. Since the Foreign Office are now responsible for the Gulf, would you please send three copies of such reports to them in future ? 2 ' We are sending copies of this letter to the Commonwealth Relations Office and the Foreign Office. [P Yours ever, RESIDENCY.' ' K „ r* r v THE BAHREIN PETROLEUM COMPANY LIMITED A W A L I, Bahrein Island. Persian Gulf. N> A i \ \ C \ J n h \ yo > PA-586 His Britannic Majesty's Political Agent, The Agency, BAHREIN 21st October, 194^» ^nAL. A; ROYALTY TICKETS - S5PTSM3SR 19/^8 FILE: #075.1 Decl Sir, ^V- I enclose herewith two copies each of the following Royalty Tickets B-668-2 to B-684-1 (inclusive); and B-663 (adjustment ticket) These tickets represent the total amount of Crude Oil run from Tanks Nos. 131, 152 and 153, to the Refinery, upon which the Royalty for September 19^8 will be computed. pU | I also enclose five extra copies of the Summary of Oil Deliveries. In addition to the above, please find enclosed one copy each of the following tickets, viz:- A-l511-2 to A-1558-1 (inclusive) These tickets represent the amount of Arabian Crude Oil run from Tanks Nos. 132, 133, 134, 135 and 143. Yours very truly, For R. M. ROYALTY TICKETS - OCTOBER 19^.8 File: #075.1 Dear Sir, I enclose herewith two copies each of the following Royalty Tickets B-684--2 to B-702-1 (inclusive). These tickets represent the total amount of Crude Oil run from Tanks Hos. 131, 152 and 153 to the Refinery, upon which the Royalty for October 194-8 will be computed, I also enclose five extra copies of the Summary of Oil Deliveries. In addition to the above, please find enclosed one copy each of the following tickets, viz;- A-1557-2 to A-1612-1 (inclusive)• These tickets represent the amount of Arabian Crude Oil run from Tanks lies • 132, 133, 13A and 14.3 • Yours very truly. (REFINERY SUPERINTENDENT). (STATE ENGINEER).THE BAHREIN PETROLEUM COMPANY LIMITED FJ: A w a 1 i, { ^ ' Bahrein Island. Persian Gulf. PA-755 22nd December, 19^S A ^£A/' ^ His Britannic Majesty's Political Agent, The Agency, BAHREIN, ROYALTY TICKETS - NOVEMBER 19£S . File: 075.1 Dear Sir, I enclose herewith two copies each of the following Royalty Tickets: B-702-2 to B-722-1 (inclusive) These tickets represent the total amount of Crude Oil runs from tanksNos. 131, 152 and 153 to the Refinery, upon which the Royalty for November 194^, will be computed. I also enclose five extra copies of the Summary of Oil Deliveries. In addition to the above, please find enclosed one copy each of the following tickets, viz: A-1611-2 to A-1672-1 (inclusive) and A-1672-S, These tickets represent the amount of Arabian Crude Oil runs from tanks Nos. 132, 133, 134 and 14-3. Yours very truly. R. M. BROWN CHIEF LOCAL REPRESENTATIVE THE BAHREIN PETROLEUM COMPANY LIMITED Attach:

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The documents in the file are arranged in chronological order.
The foliation sequence starts at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the back cover with 380; numbering is written in pencil, encircled, and may be found in the top right corner.

mods.abstract: The file mainly contains copies of Royalty Delivery Tickets showing the amount of oil shipped from July to November 1948, transmitted by Bahrain Petroleum Company Limited (BAPCO) representatives to the Political Agent at Bahrain.
